description:
In this adobe photoshop course you will learn how to emulate natural media brushes in photoshop , being able to create these brushes will give your work your personal touch

you don't have to have any experience with photoshop brushes since we will start with the brushes basics and basic settings then we will starts the natural media brushes creation with the pencil brush since it will be the simplest one then we will continue the course the rest of the brushes

this course will be updated occasionally with more brushes and creative ways to use them

i hope you enjoy the course and i will be happy to create any type of brush you have in mind related to natural media since then course is about natural media brushes
title: Natural media brushes in photoshop
